name: Golf Challenge
description:
An exciting golf match using easy controls!
Collect golf clubs and balls! With simple controls, go against friends all over the world in the World Tour!

▶ Simple Controls!
Select a direction to hit, drag the ball and let go! It's that easy!
Conquer the field with simple controls!

▶Fast match up with users around the world!
Go against players around the world in real-time with 1 vs 1 Friend Battle!

▶ Various Maps
Enjoy the game on a graphically alluring field while experiencing the beauty of the world!

▶ Varying Golf Clubs and Balls
Earn a high score by collecting golf clubs and balls of varying shapes and abilities.
Try to make a hole in one with your very own strategy!

▶ Intense game-play! Compete globally against top players in the Championship!
Win the Championship available every other week! Become a top player on the world stage!
Promote to earn huge amounts of golf clubs and cards!

▶ Become a master of golf!
Save and share your replays with players worldwide!
"If you want to hit a hole in hole, just do as I do!"

▶ "You can buy me coffee!"
Have a fun match with friends by send messaging and emoticons!
Make friendly wagers with friends to break the ice!
